Name: Magical Strings
About the game: Take the battle to your opponents in Magical Strings, a unique rhythm-projectile-fighting game. Travel across ancient China and fight to obtain the Magical Strings! Rhythmic Combat Play notes to the beat to increase the strength of your attacks. Mix and match strings to adjust the type of your attacks. Unique Characters Play as one of four characters, each with unique abilities and their own story. Ways to Play Play the way you wantâ€”solo in arcade mode, against your friend in couch multiplayer, or bring the fight online!
